page.title: 20 AUTHORS
page.content: The Boringdon and Newnham area was surveyed and described by the children of class J3C of Boringdon Primary School. Text authors were Stephen Baker, Sharon Crabb,Matthew Dove,Martyn Dove, Teresa Freeth,Fiona Harper,Matthew Horwell,Jason Jago,David Mann,Andrew Porter, Christopher Riches,Claire Sanocki, Clive Shawcross,Paul Smith, Sarah Spencer,Lisa Tootell,Jenny Zajac and James Wright from class J4. Photographs were taken by P.Chesbrough. Grateful acknowledge is made to The management of The Elfordleigh Hotel and Country Club. The West Devon Engineers Dept. Elize Hele School. Many parents of J3C children,too numerous to mention by name. Class Teacher Paul S. Chesbrough.
